title: Building for the future
text: Corego's venture is rooted in the Agile Coretime RFC, envisioning a user-friendly interface for Coretime management.

section.title: What does Agile Coretime provide for you?
section.content: Agile Coretime enables you to develop, test, and deploy your applications on Polkadot with utmost efficiency, minimizing resource consumption.

section.title: What tools does Corego offer?
section.content: Corego provides you with tools designed for Coretime manipulation and data tracking, aiming to accelerate development on Polkadot.
